paper_abstract: This paper proposes a semiring formulation for reasoning about an agent's changing beliefs: a dynamic epistemic semiring (DES). A DES is a modal semiring extended with epistemic-action operators. The paper concentrates on the revision operator by proposing an axiomatisation, developing a basic calculus and deriving the classical AGM revision axioms in the algebra. Iterated action is also considered. (C) 2009 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A sketch of a dynamic epistemic semiring
